name: Jen Brock
text: Very disappointed. The pizza was cold, half the crust was burned and half was soggy. Flavors were ‚Äúmeh‚Äù at best and their sides were inedible. This is especially awful because the price is what I would expect if I was getting Pitch or another real oven fired pizza place. Do not recommend.

name: Amanda Insalaco
text: I loved this place! It was like a subway, but for pizza, and way better. I would definitely recommend the build your own pizza. For one price you can add as much or as little as you want. This is a great place for picky eaters and athletes ‚Ä¶More

name: Grace Stetson
text:
I made it to Blaze within about 20 minutes of them closing for the night, and BOY AM I GLAD I DID!
I had been driving all day from Chicago, making pit stops in Cedar Rapids and ‚Ä¶More

name: golfr1369
text: My time first going here got a large pepperoni pizza cost was $9.95 so really good price.  For me crust really makes the pizza and they have a really nice crust not too thick, not sweet, nice body and chew factor.  One knock at this ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenny P
text: Yummmmmmmmmmmmmy!! It is so so so good!! We love it and so many good choices!! Even for the crust! Fresh ingredients!! We will be back!! Yay!!

name: Mark Watson
text: This place is fast and convenient. They build a pizza to your order the same way Subway builds subs. The cooking process is fast and your food is ready quickly!

name: Roger Jaswal
text: always a good experience here.  Can do whole pizzas, or do mix and matches to get other items.  Rewards are nice feature also

name: TJ Wensel
text: Forgot to make one of the two BYO pizzas that I ordered online. Found out that after I waited for the second pizza to be made and driving home that they made a duplicate of the first pizza. At least it tasted ok after having to heat it back up in my air fryer because the second pizza took about 15 minutes to make.

name: Legion Pk
text: currently the best pizza iv ever had.. fast food great service

name: Tiffany Zahnow
text: Great food and staff!! Only thing keeping it from 5 stars.. the BATHROOMS ugghh smell horrid. Been twice and both times they were terrible..i couldn't bring myself to sit on the seat it was soo gross. Can really tell cleaning, especially ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Lau
text: Used their app, waited the amount of time the app told us. Went to pick up the pizzas and hear "we didn't get your order, it will take us 10 minutes to make your pizzas" ‚Ä¶More

name: desirae solorio
text: It's a little pricey but totally worth it. Both pizzas tasted amazing. New favourite pizza joint

name: Aaron Flores
text: I can honestly say I was shocked at how yummy this pizza was. I love the customizing options and the staff was excellent.  If you haven‚Äôt tried it, reconsider.

name: Thomas Casburn
text: Fresh, clean pizza. Only a block away from UNL and has a fast casual style to it, a la Chipotle. Plenty of options for everyone. Highly recommend.

name: Rachel Padgett
text: Great pizza for a great price! You can order pizza from the menu or make your own with unlimited toppings; no extra charge! Staff are friendly. Casual atmosphere. If pizza is what you're craving, come to Blaze!!

name: Lindy Herbel
text: I love blaze pizza. It's set up like Chipotle or Subway, but it's pizza. They have a wide selection of fresh cheese and other ingredients to make your own pizza with, but they also have pizzas you can order,  and vegan options. Love this place.

name: Brian Wiechman
text: Was good but would have been better if they remembered the arugula and pesto on top. But defiantly will be back.

name: Susi Houchen
text: DELICIOUS!! We had heard this place was really good, but wow! It's REALLY GOOD. The staff was very helpful explaining how it worked. Order at counter Pizza menu where you can order pre "thought out" combinations i.e. meat lover, vegetarian ‚Ä¶More

name: April Pie
text: Pizza is really good at a reasonable price! Workers are nice and they keep the place clean. Would reccomend!

name: Lathan Sullivan
text:
First time here - cool concept and interior !
Unfortunately, pizza was quite burned. Went with a basic pepperoni and cheese pizza. Music was also slightly too loud for my personal preference.
Taste of pizza was good, nothing special however.

name: Sanger
text: I love the option ‚Äúbuild your own pizza‚Äù. Only take like less 5 minutes for the pizza to be made. For me is all about eating good food in healthy way. I like the thin crust, less dough and no oily. I highly recommended if you are looking for something to eat in downtown.

name: Madison Harris
text: Love the pizza,love the options

name: J S
text: Delicious Keto pizza. Very friendly staff. Billie the manger is awesome and makes us feel like long time friends. My wife and I travel all over and have been to many Blaze locations. This is our favorite location. Will be back when we pass through again.

name: William Muff
text: This was a first time visit at a Blaze Pizza and we loved it. The pizza options were great and my wife has a lot of food sensitivities and she actually had a pizza. She hasn't had a pizza made at a restaurant in years.  The food was so good I told my wife we need to investigate franchise options.

name: Kevin Runions
text: Amazing pizza but better service.  Great place!

name: cesar torres
text: First time I visited it was absolutely delicious. However, this time the service was slow and not very good. The ingredients in the ingredients  counter were mixed with others and was not very clean.  The sauce in my red vine pizza didn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Leslie Ozenbaugh
text: The best pizza in Lincoln it's my first time eating here and it's a total hit üëçüëçüëç

name: Julie Hull
text: This is kind of like a Chipotle for pizza places. The staff and overall setup could do a better job when it comes to cross-contamination of food items. They use the same gloves and equipment to pick up meat and veggies, and they're ‚Ä¶More

name: Kevin Pflager
text: Great low price personal pizza. You pay per pizza not topping, which I love. The food is very tasty and the staff is excellent. They also have vegan cheese and gluten free crust for people with allergies. It is usually pretty crowded though, not a knock on them but they are really popular so there may be a bit of a wait.

name: Terry Southard
text: Blaze pizza is like going to Subway. You have the option to make it your way. Try using the pesto drizzle and some olive oil in place of sauce. I love it. Their signature lemonades and soda alternatives are sweet and tasty. Great place for family easy dining or for a date.

name: Matthew Stevison
text: Love it fun place decent pizza

name: David Hunke
text: Excellent, reasonably priced pizza with a wide selection of fresh toppings to choose from.  You choose your crust, several sauces to choose from and then you can add as many toppings as you want for one low price!  Pizza is cooked quickly ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael C
text: Awesome as always. So nice to build a pizza you want

name: Taylor Richert
text: God bless Blaze pizza. I never knew I needed a place like this. They opened a month ago and I've already been 5 times. The crust is thin and crispy, the toppings are always fresh and delicious, and the fired-pizza taste is something that I ‚Ä¶More

name: S Ruff
text: It's like subway with a line of fresh ingredients that you can choose from or for the same price you can pick one of there specialty pizza. My favorite thing about this place is its personalized pizza's. For me the hardest part about ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Hample
text: Wow. This pizza was awesome and I loved the fact I could completely customize it. I also had the Keto crust which was really great. I highly recommend this place! I will absolutely be back when I'm in Lincoln next. It's so good I couldn't wait to take the picture until we were done :)

name: Daniel Ikpeama
text: I love going to Blaze. The staff is kind and very personable. I always appreciate their recommendations and offering of suggestions. Makes for a wonderful quick bite!

name: David Adams
text: Good food...but spicey

name: Michael Freytag
text: Stumbled in on their first day. Lover the over all look and feel of the place. The staff seemed to be trained really well. They had great looking ingredients and the line went quick. My pizza came out perfectly cooked. They have options for people with dietary concerns like gluten free pizza dough and vegan options as well.

name: Mik Keeling
text: Ordered pizza and dough knots though a meal delivery service. It came cold, I‚Äôm 6 blocks from downtown. I get pizza from another pizza places in downtown. though the same company, and I don‚Äôt have this issue. You‚Äôre pizza sauce is very good, just wish i could have enjoyed it hot.

name: Brittany JNB Stables Labradoodles
text: Phenomenal pizza, excellent service and don't skip the s'mores cookies for dessert. The toppings are fresh and delicious, you can customize them to your liking. And the crust is perfect, thin and crispy. We will certainly be back again!

name: Brandon Bryant
text: Amazing and refreshing. You don't feel like you've overeaten like most pizza places!

name: John Trumble
text: I went for lunch with two associates.   We waited in line for about 20 minutes (literally) before we could order.  During the lunch rush, the crew had an obvious bottleneck,  but all of them seemed to be taking their time and sleep walking ‚Ä¶More

name: JH Newcomer
text: Delicious pizza and ingredients.  You're allowed (encouraged) to create your own combination of toppings and sauces.  12" pizza was $8.45 even with extra toppings.  Salad was a little pricey at $8.25 for what you get but all ingredients are very fresh.  Fun decor in a trendy downtown location next to a plaza.

name: Travis Smith
text: Tried Blaze today for the first time, thanks to my boss for recommending this place! Great pizza and the gluten free crust is pretty tasty too!! The staff are fun and amazing! Give it a try.

name: Melissa Kress
text: Enjoyed build your own pizzas!!!

name: Nick Downs
text: This is a little pizza brazier. It's a place where you can come and sit and enjoy a fresh fire baked pizza or hand made salad. It's a place for the community to make their mark. I highly recommend Blaze Pizza.

name: Hannah Masters
text: Food was great.. but people are not kidding about how bad the service is. I think it's because there are so many choices for toppings.. it takes people a long time to go through the line. I thought people were being dramatic in the other ‚Ä¶More

name: Siya Kunde
text: Best pizza I've ever had. Wood fired and amazing choice of toppings. Frequent great deals like on PI day...

name: Kile Smith
text: I got in there just before a big rush but if I hadn't gotten there when I did I would've had to wait a long time between ordering and getting my pizza. It is a good price for the unlimited toppings single pizza. Good quality as well cuz I like the thinner crust which it is and brick fire based. Very good pizza for the value!

name: Jennifer Elizabeth
text: Red head that works there is awesome! She made me vegan garlic bread because the garlic knots are not vegan! Thank you blaze for having vegan options and employing that lovely young lady! Sorry I didn't catch her name. üíö‚úå

name: Roger Day
text: I did a build your own medium pizza and it includes all the ingredients you want for 10 bucks. Nicely fired, good crust, ingredients generous and good quality. Lincoln needed another top quality pizza place, and I like this better than ‚Ä¶More

name: Zac Burns
text: I honestly love this place, one of the best fast service pizza places in the area. Pizza how you want at a reasonable price. Their ingredient selection is amazing, and I never have been unsatisfiable. The staff is really knowledgeable and helpful to first time customers. Absolutely phenomenal.

name: Eric Case
text: I love that you can create your own pizza and stack it as high as you want. Tastes great!

name: yulin tang
text: Great experienceüòã

name: Celeste Sexton
text: Absolutely LOVE that you can add toppings without having to pay extra. First two times I had it delivered and I felt it was good enough that I better eat in one of these times. Finally eating here and the taste is great!! My main cons for ‚Ä¶More

name: Connor Woodring
text: Help. I can't stop coming here. I'm trapped in pie goodness. Great food and employees. Made fresh and lots of options.

name: Jordan Diaz
text: Long line. Why are the chairs so tall? Nobody likes high tables. Good flavor but no pan pizzas?

name: ZyKing's XOXO
text: Decided to try this place after receiving a free pizza coupon in the mail. Love the location as its easily accessible when you're out walking around. The design is cool and modern. The menu is simple. I choose to customize my pizza. I love ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Whelan
text: So slow. Line moved so slow we spent a good 10 minutes in line and didn't move had to wait quite a bit longer before it moved a few feet. No one behind the counter seemed motivated and the pizza oven wasn't full.

name: Xavier Ringo
text: This is a superb pizza restaurant with an ingenuitive system to customize your own pizza. Customers can choose a type of dough, sauce, cheese, etc. as well as toppings ingredients. The decor in the building is attractive and it is an ‚Ä¶More

name: Logan Altrichter
text: This place is very similar to MOD pizza for those that are familiar. They make a very nice wood fired cracker crust pizza. You can add all of the toppings you desire which can make a loaded pizza. The service is pleasant, but can be slow at ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris W.
text: Cozy eatery. Very neat selection. A warm atmosphere and friendly vibe. Excellent prize for their offerings. Tasty beverages also provided. ‚Ä¶More

name: Austin Turner
text: Koty is an excellent worker! She is very kind and personable. Definitely made us few comfortable, and ensured our pizza was left in good hands. Please do not let her go!

name: Erika Harpham
text: The food is amazing, long wait though.

name: Caitlin Evans
text: I love Blaze pizza. But I won‚Äôt be going back for awhile. The service in Lincoln, NE has greatly declined. We have had longer wait times for the pizza. Our pizzas frequently have the be remade after being messed up during the baking ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Stanke
text: Amazing build your own pizza place. Employees are super nice, the lemonade is amazing, and the toppings are seemingly endless. They even have gluten free crust and vegan cheese if that's your thing. Less than $10 for your own personal pizza which can easily be 2 meals.

name: Scott Kaye
text: Quick, the way u want it. Tasty! But get there early! We arrived at 9:30pm the other night and were turned away. Odd, since pizza oven was still alfame and it was 30 minutes to close. 2nd time that has happened.

name: Bob G
text: Great customer service and delicious food.

name: Nichole Bogen
text: I had the 1/2 pizza and berry salad today. Fresh and delicious.

name: Alison Reckewey
text: I could go there everyday. Pleased to have a place like this downtown and near campus

name: Victoria Bravo
text: I've gone back for pizza here more times than I'm willing to admit. EPIC each time. I've taken a liking to adding goat cheese and a drizzle of pesto to each build-your-own creation! Great bang for your buck too!

name: Andrew Gnuse
text: Pizza tasted awesome 5 stars. Person serving had a dip in! Beyond gross and nasty! My crust was burnt to a crisp.

name: Eva Linn
text: Soooo good!

name: Tomasz Szemberg
text: Very good pizza. Most people take it go. Popular place so sometimes considerable lines build up.

name: Joseph Gulick
text: Expensive and lacking flavor.

name: Branden Stahr
text: Don't do online orders if you can't hang with online demand!  People do NOT want to stand there and wait for 10 minutes for a pizza!  I am VERY disappointed in the customer service at this place!

name: Tanner Sherlock
text: Excellent pizza. I had a spicy chorizo and pepperoni pizza. üòçüòçüòçüòçüòç

name: Tonya Johnson
text:
This would of got at least 4 stars, pizza is good...
but one of my biggest pet peeves is a customer talking on there phone while others are dining. But oh no.... We got to see the manager walk around the eating ‚Ä¶More

name: Mariah Fredrick
text: I received an order from this restaurant from one of the local delivery services I work for. This was one of the worst experiences I have had at a restaurant in a long time or possibly ever! They were short staffed and had a huge line ‚Ä¶More

name: Brendon Hauder
text: Brilliant idea for a new spin on Pizza! Very tasty! Lots of premium ingredients from which to choose. Nice atmosphere with tall ceilings that reminds you of classic pizza arcades of old. Something reminescent of Toy Stories' Pizza Planet. Brilliant!

name: Jill L Francke
text: Glad to have a pizza place in LNK with a keto option!

name: Jere Jones
text: The pizza was great, friendly staff. Clean facility. And the price was very reasonable.

name: Cindi Weiss
text: I love the freshness and also love having everything I want in my pizza for one price!  The spicy red sauce was awesome!

name: Elizabeth Cookston
text: Great pizza and service!!  Will definitely be back again soon!!!!

name: Jessica Y
text: Amazing pizza, sooo good. Fast service, despite the fact that they were pretty busy. Great staff.

name: Jennifer Hendrickson
text:
My gluten- free enjoyment is a PRIME EXPERIENCE with no extra cost and Military Veteran's Discount~ High 5 to "Blaze"~
The Staff has spunk and they are quick and get you in and out ~ Can't say enough ‚Ä¶More

name: Marcus Schneider
text: Absolutely amazing customer service! Only 2 workers when our group of 13 came in and they were so fast and friendly. It was the first time for some of us and we loved it! We will definitely be back!! #leaveyourmarc

name: Benjamin Nelson
text: That's a good meal for the price. Feels fresh and healthy. Choose your own toppings is fun. Toppings choices are good. Really like the thin crispy crust. Was reasonably fast and was filling for a $8 meal. The place was a bit loud... Hard to have a conversation. Will be back for sure.

name: Austin Greiner
text: Wife ordered through doordash when I was delivered mine hardly had any blue cheese and hers was drenched in bbq sauce! Otherwise it was decent

name: Tyler Bienhoff
text: Great build your own pizza place. They have special pizzas or you can get unlimited toppings or just one topping for a cheaper price. They also have beer and good drink selections. Service is always quick even when there's a line. One of my new favorite places to eat in Lincoln.

name: Celina Beatty
text: Very affordable and great drink selection. The employees were all very friendly and patient, as this was our first time in. The barbecue chicken pizza is good and nothing like a typical one. I really liked how thin the crust is. A great place to have near a college campus. If you are familiar with MOD Pizza, it is pretty similar.

name: P C
text: Awesome pizza.  Great concept of ordering.  Great prices.  Fresh ingredients.  Good for lunch or dinner

name: Buck Shawhan
text: Great "custom" pizza experience.  Fast, fun, affordable.

name: Bob Bobathan
text: Bland, generic, not even the texture provides any satisfaction

name: Scott Shipley
text: This place is so great.  Awesome pizza and service is super fast.  Oven cooked pizza is blazin good.

name: H Bebout
text: Made a delicious garlic cheese pizza!

name: Dustin Easterday
text: Great pizza place, it works alot like subway but with pizza! You can make your own pizza without paying an arm and a leg for extra toppings.  Very fast as well, took maybe 7 minutes for my pizza to finish baking

name: Rex Shipley
text: Great pizza, love the choices of ingrediants. One of my favorites.

name: Greg Hyde
text: The choice of toppings and that crust cooked to perfection!  Plus the staff was super friendly!

name: Kelly Pierce
text: Good pizza made the way you want it. Crust nicely cooked crunchy but not burnt. Reasonable price, clean store, nice atmosphere for counter pizza place. Good family place.

name: Kristy Hill
text: Great pizza and very affordable. You pay the same no matter what toppings you get. The only downfall is location, would be nice if they were in a place that has better parking. If you go downtown just for pizza it sucks trying to find a parking space.

name: Ryan Regnier
text: Pretty good pizza at a reasonable price.

name: Jahn Landrigan
text: I like Blaze Pizza. üçï The pizza is good, but it's the value that really makes it great. I get a build-your-own with four or five toppings every time, and it's around $8. üíµ Edit: they increased their prices of pizzas by a dollar or so recently. It almost brought me down to a 3-star rating

name: Hunter Sieckmeyer
text: Not just great food, but a great experience. The pizzas are good and watching them be made is fun and allows for just what you want. The staff are friendly and follow your preferences to a T. Lines were long but it was worth the wait. ‚Ä¶More

name: J Rodriguez
text: Great pizza, service was good. The dough knots are the best. Really need to try the 4pack.

name: Ryan Kister
text: I love this place. Great vibe, great food. Perfect atmosphere. Overall great value for cost of meal.

name: Johann
text: This place has options for keto people

name: Jessy Braddy
text: They do an honest job with their make your own, you can drown it with cheese and toppings to your hearts content. Could use better quality meat ingredients but that's to be expected for the price. All around worth the price and you won't leave disappointed. Although I  still kinda wish this place was still Pretzelmaker

name: Alyssa Di Paolo
text: I work downtown so I decided to order lunch a few times at Blaze and every time, my order has been wrong. I don't even order anything unique or request anything special. I order the pizzas they have on the menu and my pizzas have been ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher J. Curiel
text: I love this place, it's pizza and the price.

name: C. K.
text: Beyond good pizza made in front of you. If you haven't tried Blaze, I would highly recommend it!

name: Charles Bronson
text: Pretty cool. Lots of different ingredients. So much so I made a Greek pizza. Soooo good. The cool thing is you can pretty much make a healthy pizza. Not many places do that. Staff is very accommodating and friendly. Just a good experience.

name: Brendan Colford
text: Came in and my GF asked the cashier a question, the cashier without saying a word walked over to another employee shook her head and handed the pen to other employee and left. Obviously couldn't be bother by us, I guess. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ruth Ostgaard
text: Good pizza! Love that they have low carb/keto choices!

name: Alan Blair
text: Great quick za joint. Good for the budget conscious, and not short on flavor. Pizza builds similar to a sandwich place. Lots of veggie options. Service varies, sometimes spectacular, sometimes lackluster. They seem to have a high turnover rate. Great location in downtown Lincoln.

name: Rj Mourey
text: The pizza is amazing, and the price makes it even more amazing. I absolutely love this pizza restaurant and would recommend this place to anyone. The only negative review i have about this restaurant is about who i assume is the owner. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Megan Gray
text: The best pizza I've had in a long time!!! I love the topping options and I love how the toppings don't cost extra. I did want some of the cold things after cooking, but they didn't ask, just gave my husband the pizza; next time I'll get it. ‚Ä¶More

name: Beth Swihart
text: Great pizza, great prices - and even better customer service! The line was long but moved quickly. There were so many fresh toppings to choose from, the crust was awesome - the pizza was delicious! The employees prepping the pizza were not ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Westling
text: Not much choice on dough.  Thin crust but tasty for thin. Lots of choices on toppings.  No extra charges for lots of toppings.  Similar to Subway where you go down the line asking them to add various toppings. Different pizza. Tasty pizza.  Quick service.  Very noisy place.

name: Colton
text: Pizza was fantastic but the lid fell off the parmesan cheese shaker and it fell out on my pizza. What an adventure

name: Ben Geyer
text: This place is a great place to get a fast casual bite to eat. They have a great selection of toppings to put on the pizza and there is no limit. A single pizza with anything you want on top cost 7.99. I thought the service was good as well. My only complaint was that the music was really loud.

name: Dennis Kornbluh
text: Lincoln now has world-class pizza! Freshly made before your eyes using the best ingredients and cooked in a wood-fired oven, this pizza is far above the local fare, and on par with any big city. Did I mention that it's very affordable? Thank you, LeBron James (he owns the chain, apparently).

name: Abuggeek Named Meatloaf
text: It's my favorite pizza joint in Lincoln.  It's a basic concept of fast casual build your own pie. Has unique hipster twists. No charge for extras. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Miller
text: The Keto diet is extremely popular right now. If you are on it, check out Blaze. 6g of carbs on the crust for an entire pizza! And it tastes good!

name: Adam Costenbader
text:
Very fun, very fast!

I enjoyed talking my team here for lunch and we all had a good experience with ‚Ä¶More

name: Marlon Weiss
text: First visit, tasty fast pizza. One size fits all. Great drink options, lemonade and blue sky on tap.

name: Xavier Hackenberg
text: Quick service, good pizza

name: Joseph Dondlinger
text: Love this place. They do gluten free very well.

name: Matthew Holscher
text: Great food and fast service even at a high volume. Prices are fair, I have had a pizza burnt only one time but I understand kitchen work very well and was not upset by it.

name: David Kaiser
text: Really good pizza really good price

name: Lauren Hargreaves
text: Delicious food, great location, fast service & fair pricing

name: Brian Bale
text: The price is unbeatable and the taste is unlike any pizza I've ever had.  Delicious! Glad to have this place in Lincoln.

name: Duane Buerstetta
text: Justice based on the pizza, I liked the pizza very much.  Personally, I prefer a table service restaurant, but for a self-serve, Blaze was excellent.

name: Kevin Main
text: Pizzas are great but need more toppings. New crew means training them for people with allergies again! Could have been better, but still worth it!

name: Alan Ross
text: The best value for a pizza made just like you want it.

name: Sarah R
text: Delicious thin crust oven baked pizza made to order.  Friendly staff.  My friend with celiacs loved the GF crust.

name: Christen Sadler
text: Friendly staff and quick service! Many tasty vegan options as well. Awesome pizza!

name: Erika Workman
text: Absolutely delicious pizza! Quick, friendly service. Watched as my perfect pie was made before my eyes, and they asked every step along the way if everything looked right. Will definitely come back!

name: Taylor Moeller
text: This was our first time coming here. Very disappointed with the whole experience. The employees were very rude. We waited for help for almost 20 minutes to even begin our pizza with no line. The lady that checked us out threw our change at us and the pizza tasted old.

name: Adelia White
text: This place has good pizza, however their Keto crust is not actually keto. it is 6 net carbs per slice not per pizza. So if you are looking for a place for keto this is not the place. Otherwise good food.

name: Daniel Shchur
text: Customized personal pizzas that are usually a little too big for one person, but too small for 2 or more. They are very good and would recommend to anyone. Cheaper than similar options too.

name: Richard Burns
text: A friend and I shared two signature pizzas priced at 8.45 each, but the menu had no price for them. You have to ask. Because putting the price on the menu is too much work. Their apparent motto is "we make fast pizzas" and they certainly ‚Ä¶More

name: Mari Acosta
text: Fast, friendly, delicious! Preservative free and non-gmo so I feel comfortable feeding anything on the menu to my toddler as well as myself. Gluten free and plenty of vegetarian options available too.

name: Mike Boles
text: I love this pizza. I did some work in this restaurant during construction and was fortunate enough to be in the right place at the right time during their employee training and got to feast on all of the practice pizza. Have gone back every ‚Ä¶More

name: Alex Ramirez
text: Do your research before coming here. It's like a subway but for pizza. Staff is upbeat and fun which helps with the atmosphere. I personally enjoy the high raise dough.

name: De'dan Adams
text: Really good pizza but have to go to lincoln to get it

name: ky chappell
text: Great pizza and costmer service

name: Netta Hart
text: I enjoy the fact that Your able to build your on üçï too your specifications.  I üíù the atmosphere & enjoy eating at Blaze pizza.

name: Fish Madsen
text: Cheap customizable healthy pizza. Enough said.

name: Brenda Bale
text: Delicious pizza and good price

name: James Holder
text: Always fast, always delicious, you can add everything to your pizza. One of my favorite lunch places!

name: Chris Sukstorf
text: Blaze is a super great place to go for a quick personalized pizza. 8.45 for a pizza of your own. It's basically a Subway, but for pizza. If there isnt enough to meat or cheese, they will add it for free.

name: Kate Stous
text: Fantastic gluten free pizza. I love the selection of toppings. They get bonus points for having tons of soft drink options that have no high fructose corn syrup and a drink with passion fruit. I'll definitely be back.

name: Â∑ß„ÅÆÊäÄT's skills
text:
You can choose several toppings on your pizza.  so it's possible to make your original unique pizza.
It's crispy so I like it!

name: brandon johnson
text: Wow! Great pizza. Rivals the best in town. Thin crust, fresh to death ingredients that you build it like subway. Sauces all amazing, along with topper sauce. Omg. Words can't describe. Under 10 bucks for custom craft pizza. Will go back frequently

name: Angela Rivey
text: This place allowed me to try new toppings that I had never tried before and the pizza I created had me in heaven! This place has seriously ruined all other pizza places for me now. ‚Ä¶More

name: Becky Scott
text: Love that I can put blue cheese on a pizza. Quick service.

name: Karl Seamster
text: Use to go three times a week pizza was phenomenal

name: John Duggar
text: Super fun. Great idea for how to make pizza.

name: Jedediah Weis
